relevant_findings.general: Patient is alert and oriented times three, and comfortable.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 and S2, non-displaced PMI, no jugular venous pressure appreciated.
relevant_findings.respiratory: Breath sounds clear to auscultation bilaterally.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Bowel sounds positive, soft, non-distended, mild tenderness over incisions which are clean, dry, and intact.
